name: Sonic Colors DX
overview: Sonic Colors HD/DX is a bundle of original modifications to the original (wii) Sonic Colors on a modified version of the Dolphin Emulator, with the goal of bringing the game up to modern graphics standards. This mod aims to be more faithful to the original design than Sonic Colors: Ultimate, while containing fewer glitches. Features: - Easy One-Click install script - Preconfigured for 16:9, FHD to 4kHD, 60fps, Fast Loading, Unleashed/Gens control map - Original, high-poly Sonic model with improved shading - Original, high-poly model for most stage objects (rings, wisp capsules, springs, etc) - Fixed and improved bloom (Original bloom removed from stages and replaced with a post process shader) - Improved unleashed-inspired color grading - Improved lighting - HD UI textures (thanks to triforce141 for letting me use his upscales!) - HD textures for objects and enemies (some by triforce141, some original) - 60fps fix for Aquarium Park Act 1 - Depth of Field Effect - Restored stages to originally intended order
